description: This table stores the sale level information of merchandise orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the merchandise order record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This column contains a unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: MERCH_UNIT_PR
columns.description: This column contains the final sale price for a merchandise in an order. If the price was overridden, this column contains the override price, and the original price is stored in Merchandise Original Unit Price column.

columns.name: MERCH_RETURN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The merchandise return reason category ID for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Needed


Wrong Product


Damaged Product


Price Match


Other

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: This column holds the quantity of merchandise sold in the sale contact.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status category ID for the sale contact.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Pending Rx Entry

Pending Fill


Fill Rejected

Fill Initiated

columns.name: STATUS_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the instant that sale contact moved to its current status.

columns.name: CHARGING_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient of the pharmacy visit contact to use for charge and payment posting.

columns.name: UNIT_ACQUISITION_COST
columns.description: This column contains the acquisition cost for the merchandise.

columns.name: CASH_PRICE
columns.description: This column contains the total cash price for the merchandise sale.

columns.name: CASH_PRICE_CALCULATED
columns.description: This column holds the original total cash price for the merchandise sale when the cash price was overridden.

columns.name: CASH_PRICE_OVERRIDE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category ID for the cash price override for a merchandise sale.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CASH_PRICE_OVERRIDE
columns.description: This column holds the user specified value for the cash price for the merchandise sale.

columns.name: TAX_DUE_TOTAL
columns.description: This column contains the rounded value for total taxes due for the merchandise sale.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column contains the total cost of the merchandise including any taxes applicable to the merchandise sale.

columns.name: TAX_EXEMPT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the tax was exempted for the merchandise sale.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RX_TAX_ROUNDING_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The rounding method  category ID used to calculate the total taxes for a merchandise sale.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Standard


Round Up

columns.name: TAX_EXEMPTED_TOTAL
columns.description: This column contains the rounded value for total amount of taxes exempted for a merchandise sale.

columns.name: SALE_PHARMACY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the pharmacy record associated with the merchandise sale contact.

columns.name: RX_CHARGE_DROP_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains the latest instant the charge associated with this contact was dropped/credited.

columns.name: PHARMACY_SALE_ITEM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the  fee or merchandise record for the pharmacy sale.

columns.name: PHARMACY_SALE_ITEM_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.
